titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2115) to amend title 49, United States Code, to reauthorize programs for the Federal Aviation Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-336, by Mr. Diaz-Balart, L..
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up for consideration.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 119.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 422.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 422.
DEBATE - The House continued with debate on H. Res. 422.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 199 (Roll no. 586).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 199 (Roll no. 587).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/30/2003--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2115 (Federal Aviation Administration programs reauthorization).
